articles.author: Josh Funk, Suman Naishadham
articles.title: Greenland’s harsh environment and lack of infrastructure have prevented rare earth mining - AP News
articles.description: Greenland’s harsh environment, lack of key infrastructure and difficult geology have prevented anyone from building a mine to extract the sought-after rare earth elements that many high-tech products require. Those challenges won't go away even if President D…
articles.content: Greenlands harsh environment, lack of key infrastructure and difficult geology have so far prevented anyone from building a mine to extract the sought-after rare earth elements that many high-tech pr… [+6236 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: These 60,000-year-old poison arrows are oldest yet found - Ars Technica
articles.description: Hunter-gatherers probably derived the poison from the milky bulb extract of a Boophone disticha plant.

articles.title: Why Tech Launches Stopped Feeling Magical - Lifehacker
articles.description: People used to camp out to buy new phones. Wild!
